website_summaries.verdict: A trash can with a cult-like following.
pros: Only round in the front – a flat back means it lines up perfectly against a wall and takes up less space
Owners swear that this is the one trash can that doesn't smudge or leave fingerprints easily
cons: Some have trouble locking the liner rim into place after putting in a new bag, but the solution to the problem is simple

customer_reviews.title: Not with it
customer_reviews.text: We have had this trash can for 2 1/2 weeks and now every time we open the lid it makes a loud croaking noise. If you do decide to go with this can the lid is very fragile. The first time we opened it (with normal amount of pressure on the foot pedal) the lid opened further than it is intended and hit our granite counter tops leaving a line etched in, so now I put my hand on top of the lid just Incase
customer_reviews.author: Allissa Rose

customer_reviews.title: Sealed Lid so garbage bag doesn’t fall in!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I have a house with many people including kids. This garbage keeps the garbage bag intact with its tight lid grip. So when u throw food down it, the bag doesn’t slide causing food to go outside the garbage bag. I love it’s stainless steel touch and all. They recommend u buy their bags but I didn’t. I have a whole box of garbage bags I bought from Costco the 13 gallon bags, and they work just fine. This garbage can is durable, stainless steel and much reliable when it comes to reducing a smelly garbage and food outside of the bag. It’s worth the money! Hope I helped :)
customer_reviews.author: Anjelly

customer_reviews.title: Complete Piece of Garbage (no pun intended)
customer_reviews.text: I have had this super expensive garbage can for only 2 months, TWO MONTHS, and it cost $100. It has already broke. Contacting the manufacture expecting a replacement, instead they send me a part to fix it? What? You are telling me that a premium trashcan will go bad in a matter of months and instead of replacing the thing, you send me a part and now I have to fix it? This is not a car, or a house. It is a trash can. This can was a replacement for a previous Simple Human can that also prematurely broke from manufacture defects. I am never buying from Simple Human again. They are truly awful products.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: absorbs odors (and not in the way you want)
customer_reviews.text: I made sure to get a stainless steel trashcan that wouldn't absorb odors. Unfortunately, some of the upper parts of the lid are plastic and absorbed odors after a few months. We scrubbed the can, deodorized, took out trash frequently and nothing a bad odor still lingered. It was the can itself even after it was cleaned. We had to soak it upside down in vinegar and water to get rid of the smell and now the lid makes loud irritating sounds upon opening and slowly closing. It will only happen again over time until I give up and buy a new- and different- can. Lesson learned- no plastic parts.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for people with thieving cats!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this trash can because my cat was once a stray who hasn't ever managed to break the habit of scavenging, though she's well-fed. She's also frustratingly smart and managed to defeat all of our "cat-proofing" efforts on our old trash can. The lid of the trash can is flush with the rim, so cats can't paw it open, and they'd have to be really heavy/strong to trigger the pedal to open it. It's also quite stable, so pushing it over isn't an option.
customer_reviews.author: Lissa Bryan

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY TRASHCAN
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Simplehuman trashcan. This is by far the nicest I've seen. Stainless is fingerprint resistant, heavy duty and is overall a very quality piece. The first one lasted us 8 years, but the foot pedal stopped working, but I will say with 2 younger kids at the time, I saw how it got stomped on a few times lol. This one does seem better built, and it has a slow close lid which is a bonus. Also came with their version of a 10 pack of trashbags. Bit expensive, but I can't stand plain white plastic trashcans :)
customer_reviews.author: Doug Rowan

customer_reviews.title: Here's how to stop it from grunching
customer_reviews.text: This is a great trash can until it starts grunching at you. If you own one, then you know what I mean. If you don't, you probably think I'm a poor speller. Regardless, after a month or two, when the lid is automatically closing, it will begin making a grinding crunching noise. It will eventually get so bad that the lid may not close without help. What's going on is friction in the rotation point, where the lid connects to the base. All you need to do is spray both spots with a little graphite spray (other plastic-safe lubricants might work too), and it stops grunching at you. Otherwise, it's a great trashcan.
customer_reviews.author: IBuyTooMuchOnAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Loud squeaking sound
customer_reviews.text: I've had this 7 months now and it makes the worst loud squeaking sound when the lid shuts and most of the time the lid I still stays open and I have to manually shut it anyway. Loved it at first. Hate it now. My son actually hold his ears when the lid closes that's how loud it is. I thought fot $100 I was buying something that would last but I've gotten better trash cans at Wal-Mart for $20. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Ok but....
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok. I had to replace my original Simple Human can that lasted about 10+ years. This one seems to be built to only take the simple Human can liners. It is one receptacle. My last one had a hard plastic second insert that allowed any garbage bag. It does look nice and was packaged exceptionally well but I’d like to be able to use the grocery store liners. It also makes a loud POP when you lift up lid to change liner. Not sure about this and there were no directions enclosed with product. I would expect more at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Jilesoph

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and sanitary!  Great look as well.
customer_reviews.text: No complaints about the old plastic version until it broke after 5 years. The old one you had to touch the lid to open and close. Not real sanitary when u think about it. Love the look of this trash can with our appliances in the kitchen. Live the foot pedal on this one. Came ready to go put 9f the box. The J bags work perfectly but I will just buy 13 gallon bags at almost a 1/3rd of the price. Love the can, though. I love the 10 year warranty. Worth the $100 versus the plastic version at nearly $50.
customer_reviews.author: Raylen

customer_reviews.title: 5-Stars!!! Super practical and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality!! I really like this trash can. After having an automatic lid stainless steel trash can for the last 5 years, I'm happy to move to one without an automatic open (they always break). This can opens with a simple push of the foot (or you can just lift it open) and has a soft close once released. The top surface of the can is stainless steel and when you open it, the round ring that holds the liner in place stays attached. This makes for a very easy liner change. The large opening makes it easy to pull the full bag out. I appreciate so many practical things about this can...it also has a 10 year warranty!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Fullwood

customer_reviews.title: Terrible design, does not stay when foot pressed so ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible design, does not stay when foot pressed so it is always pushing toward wall. Affects performance opening and looks ugly up in the air crooked on wall. Buy a different model!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Lang

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS TRASH CAN
customer_reviews.text: Seriously never thought I’d say I love a trash can but this thing is as beautiful and smooth-operating as a trash can could be. My kitchen looks so much better than it did before with a plastic bin. This one also helps keep the bad smells in check much better. I do not regret the splurge. And if you don’t want to purchase specialty liners from simpleHuman, normal liners work fine.
customer_reviews.author: E.McClure

customer_reviews.title: Love this barrel, nice shape and perfect size. Hate spending so much on a trash barrel but definitely worth it, glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Love this trash barrel. Did not love spending 80$ on it, but for something you use all the time it is worth it. It is a great size, we use regular grocery store bought trash bags, 18 gal i think, and they fit perfectly so no need to buy the fancy simple human bags. I love that the lid covers the bag so you dont see the edges of the trash bag sticking out, love the soft close and the large foot pedal. Very easy to clean and looks really nice in the kitchen. Has a 10 year warranty as well so that makes it a little easier spending the $$ on a trash barrel.
customer_reviews.author: CCTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: SimpleHuman 12 Gallon SS Trash can; well built, works great, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This product is worth the money we paid for it. It works well. Seals well. But, it is made to accomodate bags specifically designed for it. That said, with a minimal effort you can make standard 13 gallon store bought bags work just fine. They are just not the neat and clean easy fit that the bags the company sells for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred and Carolyn Closson

customer_reviews.title: It’s a trash can.... holds trash in place.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of material has gone down since we last purchased a Simplehuman trash can... the stainless steel is thinner. As for easy to clean this model does not have a removable inner bin, so it requires a little more effort to clean. Also the lid has a plastic liner, likely will absorb orders more quickly than our last model, which had a full stainless steel lid. Another dislike the lifting rod is on the outside.... not really highlighted in the photos. If that matters to you, beware.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dunstan

customer_reviews.title: My wife now agrees with my choice
customer_reviews.text: Originally, my wife was skeptical that I was purchasing this trash can in place of an older Simple Human can we had that was 'working just fine'. But now, she sings the praises of this new can -- much larger capacity, a similar footprint for space use, and that ever so pleasant soft closing lid. We both love this can. :)
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purchased a defective garbage can, want a replacement or refund ASAP!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these garbage cans. Upon receiving the 2nd one, it immediately started to make a loud noise. I contacted the seller and by the way they were really good with communicating with me and offered to send me a new motor. However the replacement motor did not fix the problem so I asked for a replacement garbage can because this one is obviously defective. I’ts been about a month and I have not heard back from simple human. This is no way to run a business!!
customer_reviews.author: e garcia

customer_reviews.title: Stream line, easy to clean, and large mouth for garbage. Solid lid.
customer_reviews.text: What I like the best is the stream line of the can and lid and the large mouth for garbage. My previous one had many grooves and parts in the lid and garbage would get stuck in them. Also my previous one had a weak lid and it broke. The biggest disappointment was that the lid was supposed to ease down and not land with a thud. That lasted a week. It thuds down if we let go of the pedal too quickly. I kept it because I liked the other benefits more than the thud aspect of the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta K Svihovec

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Used to have my kitchen trash can under my sink. No matter how often I changed it the smell was still there. Once I got the Simple Human trash can, no more smell. Additionally, it holds a lot more trash than the little one under my sink so I save $$ not changing the liner everyday or every other day. It's sleek and clean and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: KJcautious

customer_reviews.title: Bad design, poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I have had this can for two months and the lid makes a creaking noise every time it opens and closes. Registered the can with simple human and contacted them to see if I could return it or exchange it. Pretty disappointed since my first can lasted the 10 years they promised. It also does not fit flush to the wall, so if you are looking for that, this is not the can.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne H Foray

customer_reviews.title: Great Garbage Can!
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted a garbage can like this for years and for some reason never purchased one. I finally got rid of my white plastic (yuck!) garbage can and now have this in my kitchen. I absolutely love it! It's sturdy and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: KristaR-M

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful trash can
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful trash can! It came with a 10 pk of “J” can liners which fit perfectly. The can is finger smudge proof, it’s a perfect size for my small kitchen. It seems high quality, the foot peddle is large.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Keehan

customer_reviews.title: Best Trash Can Ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this Trash Can, I saw it at my Brothers and came home and Ordered it. It is Quiet, Easy to insert the bag and a Great added feature to my Kitchen. I love that it is No touch Fingerprints. Would recommend this Trash can. Best Ever.
customer_reviews.author: Anita L. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Wide opening so my small children can actually throw away their garbage rather then it being on the ground. Super quite while closing and the peddle is easy to strip on to open the can.
customer_reviews.author: Aric Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Manufacturers shipping/packaging is well thought out. Zero assembly required. Well built trash can. I was impressed with the attention to detail with presentation as I pulled it out if the box. My Costco brand 13 gallon bags fit ok although not as nice as the proprietary bags. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Top garbage can
customer_reviews.text: The closing mechanism on this can works flawlessly and is completely silent. We've been using it for a couple of months and consider it the best kitchen garbage can we've had. Really a good design and the included bags fit perfectly and stay in place. Their bags are, however, expensive. We substituted Costco 13 gallon bags when we ran out and they don't necessarily stay in place all the time.
customer_reviews.author: jw

customer_reviews.title: This is the best garbage can that I have every seen
customer_reviews.text: This is the best garbage can that I have every seen. The lids slowly closes and does not just slam shut while trying to put food in it. The part that hold the garbage sack in place fits snugly around and seals the sack in place. It keeps orders out. This is just an awesome can. It fits flat against the wall and has a type of rubber in the back so it does not scratch the wall. It would work on a flat wall or in the corner
customer_reviews.author: Pamela S. Rockwell

customer_reviews.title: Over priced
customer_reviews.text: I feel like the lid is going to break every time we take out the trash bag
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Because of its shape, takes up very little room in a small kitchen. Very quiet. The bags fit perfectly. Grateful they included some with the trash can. Will continue to use their bags.
customer_reviews.author: Mary F Terry

customer_reviews.title: best trashcan
customer_reviews.text: This is great. Looks very sleek. The top goes up/down smoothly. Does not bang. I like the second rim. It covers the edges of the bag so the bag doesn't stick out. The foot petal works great. I also received complimentary bags with my purchase, which are also nice. Any and all smells stay in the trash can. Would highly recommend. I haven't tried cleaning it yet.
customer_reviews.author: pinkliggloss

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars.....Made for expensive, fashionable kitchens!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom. She absolutely loves it and loves the sample liners they come with. My mom said it is very high quality, brushed stainless and slow closing lid which is on par with a very expensive garbage container. My mom is also extremely picky and has a gorgeous, modern kitchen which she said is enhanced by this product. 5 Stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sean S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: an expensive piece of garbage
customer_reviews.text: So basically, you pay a lot to buy a piece of garbage to recycle garbage..."CRACK" when you lower outer lid after changing bags or locking it open for food prep, used for half year, lately, stepping trash makes really loud noise when opening, closing as well. Now I really don't know how to deal with the groaning. Never purchase simplehuman anything anymore!
customer_reviews.author: sherry

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money if you want a trash can that will last
customer_reviews.text: It is very sturdy, the lid closes quietly, and it does not show fingerprints. I was hesitant to pay this much for a trash can, but I wanted one that would last as long as my last one which was more than 15 years. I caught a $20 coupon on Black Friday. So far, it has exceeded my expectations and I do feel it is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Delores Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Mine started making a loud abnoyin squeak after 3 months ...
customer_reviews.text: Mine started making a loud abnoyin squeak after 3 months. Used WD40 for get rid of it. Lets see how long that lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Regan Cheng

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS ONE
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I’d write a trash can review, yet here I am. Welcome to adulthood. This is worth a review though as it’s a great addition to our kitchen. I recommend buying the liners that go with the trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: The only trash can you need
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes a trash can isn’t just a trash can. This can is solidly made, well designed, and stands up to constant use. The shape allows it to fit in a space a round or rectangular one would not work in. The lid mechanism is solid and holds up to daily use. The finish wipes clean and stays clean - no finger print issues.
customer_reviews.author: tw

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This can is the perfect size for a kitchen. I also like the wider opening as compared to the circular simple human can I bought 5 years ago. The pedal on that one broke after 5 years, but it had plastic parts. This new one has a 10 year warranty...
customer_reviews.author: W. Odom

customer_reviews.title: Worked for nine months
customer_reviews.text: Loved this trash can until it no longer closed automatically. Kept the cat and dogs out. Waiting to hear what the 10 year warranty actually means.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Cool

customer_reviews.title: Classy
customer_reviews.text: Should have brought this years ago. Sure it costs more than a plastic one. This looks great, doesn't smell, yet. A touch of class in a boring kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Scqqter

customer_reviews.title: High quality.
customer_reviews.text: Has a ring that covers the plastic bag overhanging region. Like the slow closing lid. Extremely easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Shel-esq

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: I never knew how much difference a garbage can makes in your life until I became so fed up with my old one that I ordered this. IT. IS. AMAZING. I love how securely garbage bags stay in place, and the bag is even kept hidden! My previous trash can would fill up garbage bags inefficiently, meaning when I went to empty it, the bag would only be half full. This amazing trash can efficiently fills up 13 gal bags meaning that I have to empty the trash basically half as often. I love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is well made but it's a little pricey. It's a five star product but gave it 4 stars because of the price. Not sure how long the foot pedal will hold up in our commercial environment. No problems with any squeaks or malfunction of any kind.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Best Garbage Can EVER.
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I could love a garbage can this much! Lol. Honestly if you are a clean freak like me, you will REALLY appreciate this garbage can. The way you put the bag in is so easy and it holds it in place so you don’t have to worry about tucking it in or the bag slipping, etc. I also love the look of it and how it fits perfectly against the wall. I also love how the lid closes slowly. There are just details I am now noticing like almost a month later that I’m super impressed with! Love it. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hann

customer_reviews.title: Quality is expensive these days!
customer_reviews.text: Very expensive for a trash receptacle but made of quality materials compared to less expensive models. Functions smoothly, easy to change bags. It is NOT necessary to use bags made specifically by company, use generic 15 gallon bags to save money. Probably worth the investment for everyday, long-term use (or get a cheaper one every 5 years).
customer_reviews.author: C. Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Very nice trash can. Love the slow close and no finger prints. Simply the best brand
customer_reviews.author: Karly’s mom

customer_reviews.title: The mechanism to prevent lid from slamming shut failed within one year
customer_reviews.text: The mechanism preventing the lid of this product from slamming shut with a loud noise failed within one year. After the failure the lid closed with a loud bang. The seller provided no remedy despite the warranty. I was disappointed in the product and the manufacturer's response.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Krakow

customer_reviews.title: Simplehuman makes a great product
customer_reviews.text: I never thought that I would write a review for a trash can but, I am. The step pedal is rock solid, the lid slowly closes (great feature), perfect size for our kitchen. Highly recommend this company & products.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Solid purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and good looking item. The only thing is that there is no removable plastic liner (unless it’s sold separately and I’m not aware) so if something leaks, your going dumpster diving.. other than that it’s worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst garbage can ever
customer_reviews.text: It’s completely terrible. When you pull your garbage out you can’t even flip the whole thing over cause it’s too heavy. And the doesn’t flip over so it gets in the way. Definitely pick something out.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: They Stand by there products
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 2 of these products. They do everything that they say in the product description. I did eventually have a product malfunction, but true to there word, simplehuman lived up to there warranty and sent me a replacement. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Coolspin

customer_reviews.title: Best Trash Can!
customer_reviews.text: Best Trash can ever my mom is super rough and breaks everything and this has stayed in the house for almost a year and it has survived. It’s super strong truly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Amazing buy
customer_reviews.text: I always buy simple human trash bins. This is my fourth, not because they stop working but we have multiple homes. They never disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Diandra C.

customer_reviews.title: Great 12 gallon trash can!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy construction. I like that the lid closes slowly and doesn't slam. Easy to empty and change bags. Std 12 gallon trash bags fit fine. Cleans easily and resist smudges. Great trash can!
customer_reviews.author: JackInPV

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Just received, as a replacement for a “refurnished” product that was inferior. Delivered as promised, and they replaced the refurbished item with a new one at no extra charge, though now I have the hassle of going to a UPS store to return the original item. They are paying for postage, however. The item looks much more solid than the original. We will see how it performs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice design
customer_reviews.text: Ive gotten compliments on how nice it looked in my kitchen! I really does make something "ugly" into something a bit better to look at. easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: victoria a

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! The top pops off to hold the bag in place. So glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Kenz Sij

customer_reviews.title: Nice rubbish can but pricey
customer_reviews.text: Great rubbish can. I needed something that would fit into a smaller space, and able to hold a decent amount of rubbish. This can looks great, the lid moves silently (no hard crash at it lowers), and fits perfectly (out of the way), into a small corner. It is a bit pricier than I wanted to pay, and still not sure it was worth almost $100....but for a rubbish can it is "stylish" :-)
customer_reviews.author: A. R. Francis

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Love this trash can! It looks great and I love that it conceals the trash bags
customer_reviews.author: Shaundra

customer_reviews.title: Simple Human
customer_reviews.text: Best trash can out there. This is the 3rd trash can from Simple Human that I have owned - two for my home and one in my salon suite. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: patricia Hutt

customer_reviews.title: Thin, tinny material; rusts and dents easily.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this product. It is thin, tinny and, as another customer mentioned, the lid dents easily and doesn’t close securely. I feel that it is misrepresented in the Amazon listing!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Williams

customer_reviews.title: Quality but expensive.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and finish, and looks great in the kitchen. I knocked off one star despite all that because the bottom line is that the price is ridiculous for a trash can.
customer_reviews.author: R Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Dog Proof
customer_reviews.text: Great product, well made, easy to clean, looks good, like that it is flush with wall and no lip, so dog proof. In my opinion worth the little extra cost. You can use regular trash bags, but simplehuman bags are thicker and fit perfectly with no sliding.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome trash can. A little expensive, yes, but very nice overall. It's metal, so unlikely to break anytime soon. So far my kid likes using it because she gets to use the foot pedal. She thinks it fun. Win-win for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this trash can two moths ago and then after a month the lid starts making a very loud cracking noise every time when it's closing. It is so annoying!! So disappointed for the price we paid.
customer_reviews.author: Jiang Lan

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Second can I have purchased. Great quality and worth the money. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: noelia estevez

customer_reviews.title: BEST STAINLESS TRASH CAN ON THE MARKET
customer_reviews.text: I've had to return others, then I found simplehuman. Extremely well made, bags fit and fill to perfection, opens and closes easily and without a sound. This company does it right and they also give a 10 year warranty. Looks nice and works even better. Very Very Happy. Thank You simplehuman for putting out quality cans!
customer_reviews.author: MAP

customer_reviews.title: Skip it
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this trashcan but it's hard to! Everytime you step to open the lid it slides up against the wall until it eventually has to pulled out or it starts leaning! So annoying. Wanted to return but looks like a big hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it over 1 year, and still love it. it is kindly of expensive to pay 100 dollars for a trash can, but it worth. The size is suitable for not too large kitchen, and easy to clean. Simplehuman always is not disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Yue Cao

customer_reviews.title: Love this Can!
customer_reviews.text: Love my Simplehuman garbage can. Looks gorgeous in my new kitchen. Easy to operate and keeps smells at bay. Easy to change bags and sitsflush against wall.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: After less than a year, the lid has started sticking up and all the plastic parts are creaking. The trash can itself still looks fine, but the internal components are terrible. I’d give this trash can a hard pass.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Like the high end look and performance. Dislike being limited to the manufacturer's trash bags to attain the best fit. Also, the trash can "walks" when using the foot pedal and clangs agains the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D.

customer_reviews.title: Good qality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and solid and easy to use. Wish little cheaper but overall it is good product
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice trash can.
customer_reviews.text: It is had to give a 5 star to something I think is priced too high, but I knew that going in. It functions well, and looks great. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JustPassingThru

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This thing is well built and super easy to deal with and keep clean. It is kind of an investment, but worth it I think (as long as they keep it under $100).
customer_reviews.author: Jgall

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Close
customer_reviews.text: I think this product could have been great, but the lid doesn't close. It's constantly stuck open no matter how many times we step on the lever, which completely defeats the purpose of getting a trash can with a lid. Very disappointed for the price we paid.
customer_reviews.author: Davenport Theatrical

customer_reviews.title: Design is fab
customer_reviews.text: I just got it today. So I don't know about durability. I set it up and so far I love it. It's beautiful, it seems good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Well designed
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Easy to put in new bag, doesn't get caught on the hinge.
customer_reviews.author: katherine matthews

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Fits well in my space. Looks great. Easy to clean. Standard 13 gallon bags don’t fit great but they still work ok.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Liners overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Can is well made but the liners they sell are ridiculously over priced
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Houle

customer_reviews.title: Extremely nice trash can
customer_reviews.text: Extremely nice trash can. Very well made. Inner "bag holder" ring is a nice design addition. Smooth, slower closing action is a premium addition, too.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Brown

customer_reviews.title: Does not close on it’s own
customer_reviews.text: This garbage can already gets stuck open. I have only had it less than 2 months. Not worth the $.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Howe

customer_reviews.title: Very useful & convenient
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because our pets get into the garbage, we’ve had 0 issues with that since. It’s durable, easy to clean, and keeps all that garbage smell contained very well. The only negative is that after you empty it when you put the lid back down it makes an alarming popping sound. I haven’t been able to figure out how to avoid it but after determining I wasn’t breaking anything I got over it.
customer_reviews.author: DM.Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and looks attractive.
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased this and so far I'm happy with it. I love the foot pedal for opening and the soft touch close features.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: The best trash can ever! Thank you for a fast delivery! +++++ 5 STARS +++++

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is a super great garbage can i’ve Ever had. Great material, great price , and great volume! I notice my son’s classroom use this can too! Love it! Smell good! I will recommend to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: feelme001

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Looks very classy and keeps all odors inside the can. I wish I paid the extra to get the one with the combined recycling. Worth every penny

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: If quality is a concern than this product is for you. Extremely well made and very clean a sleek design.
customer_reviews.author: Hassan Mirza

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Looks great in our kitchen against the island. It’s not big and bulky. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Great trash can
customer_reviews.text: Never thought I would be giving a trash 5 stars but this one definitely deserves it.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Flores

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and product... exactly what I wanted and needed. A year later, I feel the same way. Worth the price. But don't buy the garbage bags from Simplehuman they are costly for no good reason - buy the supermarket brand and save the money.
customer_reviews.author: ShomS

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!  Beautiful (for a trash can)
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of the cheap, cruddy, stainless step on trashcans we'd bought in the past. I decided to buy an expensive one and it's so worth it!! It's in our client bathroom at our office, which gets used about 36 times a day. It's a nice investment, they make great items.
customer_reviews.author: front desk person

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & Good Investment
customer_reviews.text: The can is fine itself, but the trash bags that come with it do not mask smells very well.
customer_reviews.author: amashopit

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to the kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: Love it and quality ... It looks great in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Sharonda Williams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect kitchen trashcan
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking a wonderfully functional trash can. The soft close lid is a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Christine E. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shape. Holds a lot of garbage. Only draw back is finding the right size garbage bag.
customer_reviews.text: Looks perfect in the space I have in my kitchen! Has clean lines and opens and closes very softly.
customer_reviews.author: LifeExtended

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT CAN FOR PET OWNERS
customer_reviews.text: Amazing trashcan! We bought this because our 70 lb dog was able to lift the lid off our former can. Unfortunately, he became quite I'll after eating lobster tails and it took him almost one week to recover. I immediately began my quest for a trashcan that not only looked good in our kitchen, but one that he could not get into. After searching and reading multiple reviews, I purchased this can. IT IS AMAZING! Number one, the smell stays in the can which is fabulous. Number two, he cannot lift the lid! Believe me he has tried and is not able! I am so pleased with this purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great!
customer_reviews.text: This can is perfect for my kitchen. It met all my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Big bass

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and works nicely. Very quiet and smooth lid. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Dantor

customer_reviews.title: This is the best trashcan I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This is the best trashcan I have ever owned. A little pricey but well worth the cost. Never thought trashcans were so important. No smells linger after the lid closes either. Wonderful investment!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda B.

product_meta.title: simplehuman 45 Liter/ 12 Gallon Semi-Round Hands-Free Step Trash Can, Brushed Stainless Steel
product_meta.description:
Size:45 Liter/ 12 Gallon| Color:Brushed Stainless SteelThe simplehuman semi-round step can has a flat back for easy placement against the wall and out of the way. Its large capacity is ideal for busy areas around the home. The liner rim lifts up for easy access to the liner, then closes to grip and keep it neatly out of sight. The strong steel pedal is built to last, and lid shox technology ensures a smooth, silent close every time.

BRAND STORY
We design tools that help people become more efficient at home.

Day to day life has room for improvement. That's the basic thinking behind simplehuman. Many activities in our daily routine are so basic that we take them for granted. Washing our hands, cleaning up after a meal, grooming and prepping our appearance. Through innovation and new technologies, we find ways to streamline these simple tasks. We call our products tools for efficient living.
feature_bullets: 10-YEAR WARRANTY - We use the best materials and solid engineering so our products will last in tough environments like your home — for years.
CODE J CUSTOM FIT LINERS – Enhance your trash experience with extra-strong and durable trash bags that fit this can perfectly for a cleaner trash experience.
LINER RIM - Flips down to hide and secure liner.
STRONG WIDE STEEL PEDAL - Engineered to last 150,000 steps - that's more than 20 steps a day for 20 years.
SILENT CLOSE LID - Patented lid shox technology controls the motion of the lid for a slow, silent, quiet close – no banging or loud noises.
INTERNAL HINGE – Prevents the lid from bumping or scratching the wall.
FINGERPRINT-PROOF FINISH - Resists smudges to keep stainless steel shiny.
